mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.* , rownum AS rnum FROM m_movie_info m) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_movie_info(movie_num, title1, title2, director, starring, genre, MPAARating, productionYear, runTime, releaseDate, poster, movie_img1, movie_img2, trailer, status, synopsis) VALUES(m_movie_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title1}, #{title2}, #{director}, #{starring}, #{genre}, #{MPAARating}, #{productionYear}, #{runTime}, #{releaseDate}, #{poster}, #{movie_img1}, #{movie_img2}, #{trailer}, #{status}, #{synopsis})
INSERT INTO m_review(review_num, memId, movie_num, rating, review_content, reg_date) VALUES(m_review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{movie_num}, #{rating}, #{review_content}, sysdate)
